topic.title: Why are we alone in the universe?
topic.body: I mean according to wikipedia the universe is 14 billion (109) years old. Why are we the only one "alive". All this time life could not spawn on some other planet?

1552589048_1KKaZQ8JXomKJsjDcfcym4mDyJBKZ.body:
> [nekololi](#comment_345_1FzZsDQdh8wk71bDLxURPzmAt2FXehoNAB): we're alone because the universe is big and expansive. there is probably life out there right now. and there is probably life that has lived and gone extinct already. and there is probably life that hasn't started existing yet but will in the future. but all of this probably takes place really far away from planet Earth and we just don't know it.

Lol feels like we are all neighbours but we constantly miss eachother.
